_info.summary: The MCP employee lookup tool is automatically added to the AI agent during deployment. No manual console steps are needed.
_info.workshop_reference: Task 6, Step 4: Add MCP tools from gateway

_note_3: === TOOL PROPERTIES: Configuration to enter in the Connect console ===

tool_properties.description: Look up an employee by their employee ID to verify eligibility for Stability360 Thrive@Work employer-based programs. Returns employer name, partnership status, eligible programs, and enrollment date.

employee_id.description: The employee ID to look up (e.g. TW-10001). Alphanumeric characters and hyphens only.

instruction.text: Use this tool when a customer provides their employee ID to verify their enrollment in a Thrive@Work program. Always ask for the employee ID before calling this tool. Format: alphanumeric with hyphens (e.g., TW-10001).

examples.input: My employee ID is TW-10001, can you check my eligibility?
examples.output: I'll look up your employee ID TW-10001 now to verify your Thrive@Work program eligibility.

examples.input: I want to know what programs I can access.
examples.output: I'd be happy to help you check your eligible programs. Could you please provide me with your employee ID? It typically starts with TW- followed by numbers, for example TW-10001.
